name: Phillip Anderson
text: Server was amazing. Larger party handled it easily. Kitchen dropped half the tables food that came out periodically. Has definitely gone downhill from what it used to be.

name: J K
text: Food was a 4 for sure. Pizza was good and the salad as well. My gripe was simply the cost... $30+ for a medium pizza, a salad and a drink.... Ouch!

name: Jeremy Wiley
text: I always enjoy Mellow Mushroom, and this location doesn't disappoint.  Staff and management are courteous and friendly.  Always enjoy eating here.

name: bryan Redmon
text: Don't know the bartenders name... But she was beautiful with a great smile and super personality... She didn't miss a beat. Great atmosphere... Great food...

name: Read Walters
text: Great location and food. Service was a little lackluster but I came during peak hours. Very nice and detailed interior.

name: Christine Owen
text: Prompt and courteous service at the to go counter. Lisa came out personally to check our order and make sure everything was correct. The food was delicious! Thank you Lisa for valuing your customers and making sure we are taken care of.

name: Marie LaFaver
text:
Loved the pizza!
Service was great.
Definitely will go back

name: doritos in the bath
text: i love this place. my first time trying it out and our waiter was great. he was super nice and the food was absolutely amazing. as a vegan i was surprised when the waiter told me they had vegan cheese. definitely coming back soon.

name: Allison Curington
text: The best pizza place in town! Impeccable service, and the owner, Lisa, always stops by to catch up and genuinely cares about her patrons. She gives so many in our community, who have hit hard times, a second chance by providing jobs and ‚Ä¶More

name: Simmy Clyde
text: taste of the food wasn't bad , however the veggie calzone only came with the additional toppings I order , and not the original toppings that were already include, the thin pizza crust was a little over baked, service seemed care-free , not in a good way. and I didn't appreciated not getting a bag when carrying 3 different pizzas .

name: Christin Milner
text: I love this mellow they have the best management and staff. If you have never had their buffalo chicken dip it is amazing!! Best pizza in Albany ga. Great atmosphere and great people keep it up guys and girlsüëçüòÅ

name: Derita Hall
text: My daughter ordered 2 pizzas and dinner lemon pepper wings and they were delicious. I certainly would recommend having a pie. The young lady that brought the pizzas out to the car was very nice. Thank you for great customer service.

name: Danielle W A
text: Go see Donna. She'll take care of ya. As always, clean restaurant, great food, excellent service üëå

name: Clint Coldwell
text: Pizza was very good and very quick in making our order. My only complaint is the prices are a bit higher then some other companys but in this case you get what you pay for. Will be a returning customer

name: bluesy1234
text: Fun place to eat and grab a beer. The pizza makers toss the dough in the air and spin it. It‚Äôs a good show. The interior is decorated with a lot of cool items, including a wall covered in hand painted and modeled rock stars from the past. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joanne Thomas
text: And this is the 2nd time we have had this server,  Rabbit, and he is amazing. Really adds to the atmosphere of the restaurant. I  try to go everytime I go to Albany. Can't wait to go back.

name: Magi Sanders
text: If your dining in go before 7pm or you will be waiting Ask for Rabbit absolute awesome waiter

name: Deborah Fink

text: Purchased a pizza to go. The veggie pizza had very few toppings. Hostess claimed that is standard for their pizzas. Will not return.

name: Jessica Watson
text: Pizza was good. Ritz burger had no flavor. I was very dissatisfied. Please hire people who know how to cook and seasoned burgers. Mine had no flavor and it was not well done as I requested. I calling them bright and early the next morning about something else I'll give an update.

name: Terrie Hutchins
text: Our family love going to Mellow Mushroom. Lisa is so good with the kids and always makes us feel special. Lisa has always supported the youth programs in Albany. Thanks Lisa got all you do

name: Betty Dopson

text: It's Mellow mushroom pizza, it was good. Unfortunately one of their cooks got sick in the middle of their shift, which through off their kitchen staff. text: Tuesday night is bingo night. Starting roughly around 7pm, but arrive early if you'd like a seat. 6 rounds of bingo with increasing gift certificate prizes from $5-$30. Good food and drinks.

name: Steven Thompson
text: Mellow Mushroom is far and away the best pizza in Albany.  Whether you want a classic pepperoni or something a bit more "far out" Mellow Mushroom has got you covered.  The pretzel bites with beer cheese dipping sauce are my absolute favorite.  Love this place, and we will for sure be going back!

text: Love the atmosphere and the different styles of pizza. Staff members are very polite and courteous.

name: Elizabeth Kaasa
text: Really good pizza. The crust is very heavy and chewy so it's great for bread lovers. They have a good selection of toppings and will make custom orders.

text: Nice friendly staff. 1st time going & I really enjoyed it. My server Rabbit was awesome!!!

text: Awesome pizza and they offer a plethora of beer choices. Also, Mellow hosts several activities (i.e. bingo, live music, etc.) throughout the week that anyone could enjoy. It's a great place to have a few beers and they have a wonderful family section for all.

text: Pizza was excellent. Brewing with flavor.  A bit pricey but the pizza was worth it. Even the outer crust was tasty..... Oh the garlic sauce... Good place for my friends who are vegetarians. Calzone was not impressive.

text: We went for a early afternoon visit and it was great. It reminded us of the days when we would hang out at The Mellow Mushroom when it started in Atlanta. We lived there then and miss it now. Mellow Mushroom holds a lot of good memories for us.

text: Excellent service, good food and nice atmosphere. They had a lot to choose from. Ordered a little Greek salad with herb vinegrette dressing. It was good and filling. We ordered a vegetable pizza. It tasted fresh, delicious and filling. We took home 2 slices. I would go again.

name: Adam Whitlock
